Class Secretary

java.lang.Object
project.models.users.User
project.models.users.Secretary
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, I_Unique<java.lang.String>, I_MessageRecipient, I_MessageSender, I_RepositoryItem
public class Secretary
extends User
implements I_MessageSender
A User subclass for the system's secretaries.

  • Constructor Details

    • Secretary

      public Secretary​(java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, Address address, java.lang.String password) throws OutOfRangeException, IdClashException
      Creates an Secretary object.
      Parameters:
      name - the Secretary's name.
      surname - the Secretary's surname.
      address - the Secretary's address
      password - the Secretary's password.
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException
      IdClashException

    • Secretary

      public Secretary​(java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname) throws OutOfRangeException, IdClashException
      Creates a bare dummy Secretary object for testing purposes. The name and surname are used to provide another element of individuality to increase ease of testing rather than just looking at IDs.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - the Secretary's ID number. This will be added to the Secretary role string to create the Secretary ID.
      name - the Secretary's name.
      surname - the Secretary's surname.
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException
      IdClashException

    • Secretary

      public Secretary​(java.lang.String idNumber, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String surname, java.lang.String password) throws OutOfRangeException, IdClashException
      Creates a bare dummy Secretary object for testing purposes, particularly the login system. The name and surname are used to provide another element of individuality to increase ease of testing rather than just looking at IDs.
      Parameters:
      idNumber - the Secretary's ID number. This will be added to the Secretary role string to create the Secretary ID.
      name - the Secretary's name.
      surname - the Secretary's surname.
      password - the Secretary's password.
      Throws:
      OutOfRangeException
      IdClashException
